law.catch_line: Responsibilities of jury during a hearing -- Court determinations upon finding of disability or partial disability.

text.section: If the respondent is found not to be disabled or partially disabled, the petition shall be dismissed.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 1, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 9, effective July 1, 1982.
